Package nano.remexp.broadcaster.locks

Class Summary
AutoApproachLock The lock for the autoapproach command that moves the tip onto the sample until it is approached.
CalibrateStageLock The lock for the calibratestage command that moves the robotic stage to its initial position.
CamAngleLock Sets the camera angle in the AFM to another position.
GotoLock The lock for the goto# commands that move the robotic stage to a sample.
LockHolder The interface for the locks that are being linked with commands to the remote experiment.
MoveTipLock The lock for the movetip command that moves the tip on the sample into one direction.
NoLock The NoLock class that is used for commands that are allowed but do not need a lock.
ScanningLock The lock for the scanning command that initiates the scan of the sample.
ScanRangeLock Sets the scan range of the AFM.
WithdrawLock The lock for the withdraw command that lifts the tip off from the sample after it was approached.
